FuncDef: This command configures an IP filter match criterion based on the ECN-Echo (ECE) TCP Flag bit, defined in RFC 3168, as being set or not in the TCP header of an IP packet.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies matching on IP packets that have the selected TCP flag bit set in the TCP header.
Specifies matching on IP packets that do not have the selected TCP flag bit set in the TCP header.
